alert.note: Alert for Western Crook; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN CROOK COUNTY THROUGH 145 AM MDT... At 1259 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Moorcroft, or 26 miles west of Sundance, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pine Haven and Keyhole Reservoir around 105 AM MDT. Devils Tower Junction around 120 AM MDT. Cook Lake around 140 AM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 148 and 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
